Reviews.Title: Wow...
Reviews.Author: robincharly
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet. Im in college and my computer is so big and bulk, so i bought the tablet because its light weight. Its great for looking stuff up for school. It goes everywhere with me.

Reviews.Title: Afunta Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mrskaye
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Afunta Android Tablet from the Weize company in Hong Kong, which was my first mistake.I didn't realize that it was coming from Hong Kong until it was to late.It took a month and 6 days before i received it.That in itself disturb me, but again my fault.It was delivered in the time they specified,but I would have ordered from a US base company had i been paying attention.The tablet is not the tablet i ordered (Afunta)just and android tablet.I want you to know this is my second review on this product.This review comes after two weeks of use.I am upset about it not being what I ordered.The tablet even though it's not the one i ordered works fine the only issue with it is the battery life and to me that's a big issue,because you can't get through anything without having to charge it up.It has a nice bright screen,which i turned down the brightness looking for more battery time.It's not happening.It surfs good and it's not slow at all,downloads apps well,connects to internet well.The charger that came with this tablet blew when taking out of plug socket.I found another around the house.My biggest issue is the battery life,and sending me wrong tablet same processor and all,but i wanted the looks as well.This Afunta has a better look than the regular android tablet.I have learn from this experience.I will always make sure that what I purchase comes from a US base company.When you purchase something who wants to wait a month and 6 days before you get it.Oh after i place my ordered i guess being the last one left at the time they switch over to SVP tablet. The one I have doesn't even have a name how about that.The box only says android and there's nothing on the tablet itself.Battery life that i get is 21/2 hours so far.They need to do better with the battery and the charger..They seem to misrepresent their product.Charger looks and feel cheap.I know it was a low cost for this tablet,but still could have had a better charger.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Michael Keller
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet for my granddaughter. Wanted a larger screen to watch netflix on.  Had a couple 7 inch tablets I had bought before but this tablet out performed them.  It has a faster processor (ran very smooth) and great screen resolution, with 8 gig of memoryI had plenty of room to download games for her.  It was delivered early and right out of the package started up with battery charge. I have encountered no problems or glitches. The only bad thing I could report was I wish the speakers were a little louder but I bought a tablet stand with speaker enhancement now can hear netflix great. 5 stars worked out so well I'm buying 3 more for my other grandchildren for Christmas.  Great Price, Great Tablet!

Reviews.Title: Totally pleased
Reviews.Author: KIM PAUL
Reviews.Content: Brought this tablet for my sister this is her first tablet an she loves it , the delivery was quick order it an it arrived within 3days time ,so far so good works great downloaded apps well works well with the WiFi at home no problems yet still waiting to see how things work out . The only thing for me is the charger is heating a little to much will have to check for a new one but overall nice tablet for the price will encourage anyone to purchase  .

Reviews.Title: Good for 1st time android users!
Reviews.Author: Mark Kjornes
Reviews.Content: This android is very good for the price. Large screen with nice picture. Easy to learn and great for the basic app nacesities.

Reviews.Title: Great for older folk, as I am.(not great, but older)
Reviews.Author: david keys
Reviews.Content: It's a very fine product, good size and easy use for the over 50 crowd. I'm just getting into it,but am pleased with it thus far.An accompanying bit of information about the basic ways to get around in it would be most useful, as many of it's users won't be as adept as the newer generation.

Reviews.Title: cant believe it
Reviews.Author: fernando torres
Reviews.Content: Very cheap product. I know I get what I played for but I mean come on. I turned it on and it froze right away

Reviews.Title: very well
Reviews.Author: Yohen Mendoza
Reviews.Content: Everything arrived as expected, without fail, a day as he said, good price, serious and responsible in all cases recommend!.

Reviews.Title: Afunta 9-Inch Google Android 4.0 512MB/8GB Tablet PC Dual Camera MID
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband so he could do his paperwork for his job, so right away while it was still fresh he loves this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice device
Reviews.Author: Dataeagle
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for.  I haven't tested full battery life yet, but works for what I needed in my life.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Cortney Walters
Reviews.Content: This tablet gets no stars from me. I only had it a few weeks and all my apps were unresponsive or froze up. All of sudden my screen froze up and went completely white.

Reviews.Title: Not for much apps.
Reviews.Author: zydron
Reviews.Content: Its somewhat great. I liked the screen size on it, but what i didnt like was that on some of the apps I would download it would crash a lot.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: telly
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I expected. its light weight and easy to use. Its just like an android phone but with out the texting and calling. It arived 2days early. I love the color of the pink. The camera isn't the best and it doesn't alow you to dowload instagram. But its exactly what I expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Its ok for playing games but freezes up alot and doesnt keep Wifi open, I have to go into settings to turn WiFI on every time I open it.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Josmar
Reviews.Content: Dont buy this tablet...it suckss it only work here for 3 hours and then never turn on againg, and the worse..

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: I just bought this tablet two days ago and it came in the mail which was great because it was fast delivery but any it goes very slow on whatever I try to get on I mean come on no tablet is suppose to go slow..i recommend no one to get this tablet..hope I get my money back

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Tiffany luz best
Reviews.Content: The tablet would freeze every five seconds. The battery in the tablet which is located on the back was moving all over the place. I was very dissatisfied. I bought a much better tablet somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Carol Angiolillo
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my husband for Xmas.  He's still trying to learn his way around it.  Good price and a good Xmas present.

Reviews.Title: Afunta 9-Inch
Reviews.Author: carely sequera
Reviews.Content: I chose this classification because I like the product.I like this product because I need it.I recommend it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy...
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter who is nine, she loves it! Out of the box and its charged and working perfectly. Bought the keyboard to go with it. All in pink of course and she is thrilled. Her mother set up for her and she is using it this evening. Great for a first tablet to learn on, good product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt Hold a charge
Reviews.Author: James Fournier
Reviews.Content: I can only use it for 1/2 hour it does not hold a charge. Really Sucks I cannot use it the way i want to

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my Tablet!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Watkins
Reviews.Content: The Tablet was everything I need and its just like having my computer with me all the time.  I'm thinking of buying one for my husbands birthday.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I thought would be a good buy for my son, buy is very very slow, n often times out and doesn't work well,terrible device.

Reviews.Title: faults in tablet
Reviews.Author: Marsha D.
Reviews.Content: the tablet is fine but the charger wasn't working,have to get another one.the tablet is sticking at times but that's ok

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Hakim  Sackey
Reviews.Content: This is a no good,it freezes,don't respond,poor quality all around.I am very disappointed with it,Probly I got a lemon,���not happy

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Taylor
Reviews.Content: It was cheaply made and you could tell. Sucky battery life and got scratches on it for no reason. Screen quality was crapy. Got here super quick but that was about it.

Reviews.Title: What I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Barbara Prater
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my 7 y/o daughter to introduce her to tablets.  She loves this device!  Its easy to navigate, the picture is beautiful and the 9 inch screen makes it easy to see.  Perfect beginners device.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Thomasina H.
Reviews.Content: i enjoy it only problem for me is it turns off in a sec if im not useing it and camara sucks and when u put videos on there and music it does not show the title of them at all not good.

Reviews.Title: Worth it.
Reviews.Author: Rose M. Riley "RRiley"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my 16 year old daughter. She loves it. It lets her take pictures and listen to music. For the money it's well worth it.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: Sevananda
Reviews.Content: it came but never worked... the seller did not take it back. My son was sad since it was for his birthday. I got a better deal on craigslist.
